sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"让，允许"之意。
means: allow ：普通用词，侧重听任、默许或不加阻止。在正式场合可用来表客气的请求。
let ：常用词，用于各种非正式场合，语气最弱，指允许或无力阻止某事，暗示漠不关心或听之任之。
permit ：正式用词，在多数场合可与allow换用，语义最强，指准许某人做某事，含权威或正式的意味。
authorize ：语气最强，指权威性的允许与认可。

sentence.Network_en: He can let the court's decision stand and permit the execution.
sentence.Network_cn: 他有权维持法庭判决，批准死刑生效。

sentence.Network_en: Will they permit you to sit in on a few classes?
sentence.Network_cn: 他们会同意你旁听几节课吗？

sentence.Network_en: Permit me to give you some advice.
sentence.Network_cn: 请允许我给你提点建议。

持工作许可(work permit): 在加工作满2年，可以申请加拿大经验移民。因此，如果你之前的工作经验是属于0AB项目，你可选择联邦技 …

2． 居住许可证(residence permit) 在肯尼亚停留6个月以上者，须办理有效期一年的居住许可证，并在工作合同续延时同时办理延期手 …
学习许可（study permit）：俗称大签，是你合法居留在加拿大的一个身份凭证（学生身份）,一张A4左右的大纸。只有持有这个文件…

jx.jx_en_mean: (dated)used for politeness before making a suggestion or expressing an intention
jx.jx_cn_mean: (旧)请允许我（提出建议或表达意图之前的礼貌语）

lj.lj_ls: 请允许我纠正你的错误。

jx.jx_en_mean: if the specified thing does not prevent one from doing something
jx.jx_cn_mean: 如果…许可的话，如 果…允许的话

lj.lj_ly: weather permitting, guests can dine outside on the veranda.
lj.lj_ls: 天气许可的话，客人可以在外面的阳台上就餐。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (originally in the sense 'commit, hand over'): from Latin permittere, from per- 'through' + mittere 'send, let go'

entry.def: If someone permits something, they allow it to happen. If they permit you to do something, they allow you to do it.

example.ex: He can let the court's decision stand and permit the execution...
example.tran: 他有权维持法庭判决，批准死刑生效。

example.ex: The guards permitted me to bring my camera and tape recorder...
example.tran: 卫兵准许我带相机和录音机。

entry.def: A permit is an official document which says that you may do something. For example you usually need a permit to work in a foreign country.

example.ex: The majority of foreign nationals working here have work permits...
example.tran: 大多数在这里工作的外国人都有工作许可证。

example.ex: He has to apply for a permit, and we have to find him a job.
example.tran: 他必须要申请工作许可证，我们得给他找份工作。

entry.def: If a situation permits something, it makes it possible for that thing to exist, happen, or be done or it provides the opportunity for it.

example.ex: He sets about creating an environment that just doesn't permit experiment, it encourages it...
example.tran: 他着手营造一种不仅可以进行试验而且鼓励进行试验的环境。

example.ex: Try to go out for a walk at lunchtime, if the weather permits...
example.tran: 只要天气不太差，中午尽量出去散散步。

entry.def: If you permit yourself something, you allow yourself to do something that you do not normally do or that you think you probably should not do.

example.ex: Captain Bowen permitted himself one cigar a day...
example.tran: 鲍恩上尉破例允许自己每天抽一支雪茄。

example.ex: Only once in his life had Douglas permitted himself to lose control of his emotions.
example.tran: 道格拉斯一生中只有一次情绪失控。

entry.def: You can use permit me when you are about to say something or to make a suggestion.

example.ex: Permit me to give you some advice...
example.tran: 请允许我给你提点建议。

example.ex: Permit me to offer you my sincere congratulations.

means.word_mean: 1. a legal document giving official permission to do something
2. the act of giving a formal (usually written) authorization
3. large game fish; found in waters of the West Indies

sentences.sentence: "She permitted her son to visit her estranged husband"
"I won't let the police search her basement"
"I cannot allow you to see your exam"

means.word_mean: 2. make it possible through a specific action or lack of action for something to happen;

sentences.sentence: "This permits the water to rush in"
"This sealed door won't allow the water come into the basement"
"This will permit the rain to run off"

means.word_mean: 3. allow the presence of or allow (an activity) without opposing or prohibiting;

sentences.sentence: "Children are not permitted beyond this point"
"We cannot tolerate smoking in the hospital"

auth_sentence.content: I could be running a parking permit lease business.
auth_sentence.res_content: I could be running a parking permit lease business.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I could be running a parking permit lease business.

auth_sentence.content: To permit third parties to send you promotional materials.
auth_sentence.res_content: To permit third parties to send you promotional materials.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To permit third parties to send you promotional materials.

auth_sentence.content: They would not permit the left to destroy itself.
auth_sentence.res_content: They would not permit the left to destroy itself.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They would not permit the left to destroy itself.

stems_affixes.word_buile: intermit[v.中断]+t+ent……的→adj.间歇的,断断续续的
per始终+mit送,放出,派,错过→始终放出→许可

stems_affixes.value_cn: 承认,供认;准许……进入,准许……加入
把……交托给,委托,委任;提交;犯[错误],干[坏事]
stems_affixes.word_buile: com共同+mit送,放出,派,错过→共同送→委托

stems_affixes.value_cn: 发出;放射;吐露;散发;发表;发行
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+mit送,放出,派,错过→送出[气味]等
inter在……中间+mit送,放出,派,错过→在中间送东西→打断,间断
sub在下面+mit送,放出,派,错过→放下面→屈服
per始终+mit送,放出,派,错过→始终放出→许可
re再次+mit送,放出,派,错过→再次放出,送[钱]→宽恕,汇款

sentences.en: I would like to do it with you, but I am not sure whether my parents permit.
sentences.cn: 我愿意和你一起做, 但不知我父母是否允许。

sentences.en: We will have our meeting here, if you permit us.
sentences.cn: 如果你允许的话, 我们的会就在这里开。

sentences.en: Papa would not permit the waste of a single drop of water.
sentences.cn: 爸爸不允许浪费一滴水。

sentences.en: We do not permit smoking in the room.
sentences.cn: 我们不允许在屋里吸烟。

sentences.en: Circumstances do not permit my going with you.
sentences.cn: 情况不允许我和你们一道去。

sentences.en: Time does not permit that I stay longer.
His illness would not permit that he (should) work hard.
sentences.cn: 病魔不允许他辛苦工作。

sentences.en: The doctor has permitted him only two meals a day.
sentences.cn: 医生只允许他每天吃两顿饭。

sentences.en: He permitted himself three cigars a day.
sentences.cn: 他允许他自己一天抽三支雪茄。

sentences.en: You permit your children too much freedom.
She permitted me to borrow the book.
I can't permit this to happen.
Circumstances do not permit me to leave.
The doctor will not permit mother up until her leg is better.
sentences.cn: 在母亲的腿好些之前, 医生不允许她起床。

sentences.en: You can't take pictures here without special permit.
sentences.cn: 未经特许, 你不能在这里拍照。

sentences.en: I haven't got a driving permit.
sentences.cn: 我还没有得到驾驶执照。

sentences.en: The building permits are granted by the City Building Department.
sentences.cn: 建筑许可证由城建局签发。

jushi.english: Weather permitting, we will go outing.
jushi.chinese: 天气好的话,我们就去郊游。

jushi.english: I will come in June if my health permits.
jushi.chinese: 如果我的健康状况许可,我6月份一定来。

jushi.english: Such hydropower stations have been set up in all places where conditions permit.
jushi.chinese: 在条件允许的地方都建立了这样的水电站。
